specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Pleated Pleating is a heat-setting technique where fabric is placed between a two-part mould and placed inside a steaming machine.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Mechanical > Pleated To prevent the pleated fabric from losing its wrinkles, we discourage ironing and rolling the fabric. Fold and store it instead.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron
